website_summaries.verdict: Price falls on the higher end of the scale, but the table comes with high-end benefits.
pros: This cast aluminum table has a beautiful design equally at home in classic or modern décor and also pairs nicely with other outdoor furniture
It's sturdy and high quality, with a weight that will keep it in place whatever the weather
cons: Assembly is difficult, and the table height may prevent chairs with arms from sliding under
Other models on our list are more affordable

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this table! Prettier than the pictures in the ad.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a moderately price patio table after our glass tabletop broke into a thousand little pieces on our deck. We never wanted to deal with that again, so looked for a metal table with some prettiness to it. Happy with this table. Assembly was straight forward with simple instructions. Also the hardware came shrink wrapped to cardboard so you could see everything was there. They also give you one extra of the nuts, bolts, washers and black cover caps. There are little levelers on the legs in case your surface is a little wonky.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Moffatt

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a decent table. It is exactly as the picture shows it to be. Got it today via UPS, the box it came in was a wreck, it was shipped in super thin cardboard. Fortunately nothing fell out during shipping. The table went together easily, and all of the parts were well organized with easy to follow directions. The only problem was that the screw covers did not stay on the screws, so we just did without putting them on. The screws only show from underneath the table. This comfortably seats 4, but if you used small chairs it should seat 6.
customer_reviews.author: reader in ca

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Found this exact same table (same manufacturer!) on another site that I was going to purchase. I just happened to check Amazon & found it $100 cheaper! I ordered it right away! Also, I ordered it on a Wednesday afternoon & received it nicely boxed next to our garage door nestled close to the house on Friday!! Super fast shipping! Easy to assemble with clear instructions in 20 minutes. Very sturdy & beautiful. It matches the rest of our highly expensive wrought iron furniture, and this is very high quality looking bistro table that definitely measures up for the price.
customer_reviews.author: slvc

customer_reviews.title: Great Deck Table!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well designed table of excellent quality. The cast aluminum makes it very weather proof and it doesn't rust. The open surface design allows moisture and tree droppings to fall through. I use a blower on the deck to keep things tidy. So much easier than my old glass topped table which required constant wiping. We use trays or place mats to create a solid surface when we eat. A great addition to the deck. It is just what I was looking for and I am well pleased. I recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, Lightweight and Weatherproof Patio Table
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive, lightweight patio table with umbrella hole purchased to replace a similar-sized unit with shattered glass top. It arrived with packaging somewhat damaged but contents completely intact. Once unpacked the separate components are easy to move into position, and the table is quite simple to set up with basic tools. Its leveling feet provide good stability. The instructions are well illustrated, with all hardware carefully separated and blister packed on a separate card. My only quibble was that there is no lower umbrella support; the lower ring visible on the photo connects the leg supports but it does not have an inner circle to help support the umbrella shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Towl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical at first but so far the table has held up well. Easy to assemble and the parts were complete. Instructions were included and easy to follow. took 30 minutes to assemble with the hold up for the total time being the packaging. Messy but well wrapped. The Dropship damaged the box but the packaging kept the damage confined to the box itself. I just wish the umbrella hole was a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great table at that price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller cast aluminum table for my small deck, It was difficult finding a 48" round table, and the one that I could order from a local store here was twice the cost. After doing some comparison pricing online, I came across this one, and the price was very reasonable. It arrived very quickly in a very large box, well packaged, and easy to assemble. It is a very beautiful, sturdy, and a great addition to my deck. Polishing it with a quality car paste wax and buffing it out will add a layer of protection if it is exposed to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: baba2

customer_reviews.title: Nice table simple to assemble. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The assembly took maybe 15 minutes. They have various extra nuts, bolts and washers just in case something gets lost in an outdoor assembly. Looks good and is exactly what I needed. Made of aluminum. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: The Tables Have Turned
customer_reviews.text: This table is a great value. Thread inserts are incorporated into the aluminum casting and all fasteners are stainless steel. Instructions are clear and concise with accompanying detailed illustrations. Very surprising for its price point. The casting itself is aesthetically pleasing due to the random aspect of each individual cast, yet still very cohesive when viewed as a single piece.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Wallace

customer_reviews.title: nice table
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is a nice table. I bought the 42" for my porch to go with the Crosley chairs I have already purchased. The table is just the right height. I can lean on it, plus eat. The chair arms don't fit under the table, but that's alright. It's good for me. I won't be using it with an umbrella since it's under the roof, but that is always an option later if I want to move it.
customer_reviews.author: dlr

customer_reviews.title: Not a great value
customer_reviews.text: It's an attractive table, but not very stable. I really thought it would be heavier, and less flimsy than it is. Overall, it was a disappointing purchase for our office's break area.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Voydat

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: After losing a glass top table to a storm, I replaced it with this. Quick delivery, easy to assemble, study and heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Practical.
customer_reviews.text: Have the table since the start of the session and it is both attractive and practical. We have had two tables before this in the past two years where the glass top breaks when the winds pick it up as the umbrella gets tossed out. This table, due to wind, has also blown over a few times but with no damage, which translates into no money lost. An the top looks good. A good addition to our outdoor living.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: This table is built to last. Looks elegant and sturdy. Written every penny.
customer_reviews.author: pam rollins

customer_reviews.title: Mislabeled size
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table, but 46” diameter is not 48”. After my table arrived I called Crosley and their rep apologized for the mistake and said they don’t even make a 48” table, just a 42” and a 46” table. It’s hard to believe it’s just a simple mistake when even their shipping box labels it as a 48” table. It appears they’re simply marketing and selling a 46” table as a 48” table and they know it’s only 46”. Interestingly, they market it as a 46” table on Houzz. Go figure. I just know—and Crosley even confirmed—this table is not what it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Y

customer_reviews.title: Solid  and Attractive Table
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was excellent. Table was a challenge to assemble. Extra parts were appreciated. Once assembled, the table was very solid and stable. It is what we had hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Linore Hasty

customer_reviews.title: This is just the perfect size for our deck
customer_reviews.text: This is just the perfect size for our deck. It is heavy enough that I am not worried that it can be turned over by a strong wind gust. The umbrella hole fits any umbrella pole but the plastic hole protector that came with our umbrella is a bit too big so we didn't use that part.
customer_reviews.author: Babette B

customer_reviews.title: Great table. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Easy to assemble, sturdy, and very good looking. I put an umbrella through the middle, and the entire setup works really well and looks wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: maddog

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with my purchase. It was well packed and easy to assemble. It is substantial in weight but still easy for one person to move.
customer_reviews.author: PollyW

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, actually 46 inches
customer_reviews.text: We just received this table and put it together with no problems. It came well packaged, all the parts were there, and the assembly directions were easy to follow. One warning, the table top is actually closer to 46 inches, not 48. So a little smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Good value and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Well-made and sturdy, much more so than many I have seen in stores, and at a reasonable price. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectech

customer_reviews.title: Attractive table
customer_reviews.text: Very slightly shakey due to being bolted instead of welded,but usable, attractive, and aluminum. It's kept outside so previous powder coated steel rusted onto my pavers after a few years, don't have to worry about that now Came well packed a assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: jaki

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Solid, heavy and not too hard to put together. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The table went together very easy and matches our chairs as if they were purchased together. Since the weather has turned colder we have not utilized it yet but we are looking forward to the summer so we can enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This table is terrible.  Not well made and not cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and this was not cheap. This is my first full season and the table is almost impossible to stabilize. I would like a refund and am hoping Amazon will back this product. Don't buy it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, sturdy and well made. Looks great on my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Diane J

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction. Finish is really nice. This table is heavy duty and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Maree L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, easy to assemble. However, it sits just a little unevenly.
customer_reviews.author: Nmb

customer_reviews.title: Finally enjoying this wonderful table, well built
customer_reviews.text: Took too long to receive. Finally enjoying this wonderful table, well built.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Table arrived in good shape. The design is nice
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived in good shape. The design is nice, and the piece was comparatively easy to assemble. The four table legs, however, could be stronger or have additional bracing to eliminate some wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin R. Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: It is a good value, but not a real sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: It is a good value, but not a real sturdy product
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wootten

customer_reviews.title: This is a good size in both seating height and width
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size in both seating height and width, and it is stable. I also like the fact that there is no horizontal band around the legs that is so low that it would hit us in the shins. Cheap hardware, though. It is very heavy, so post a large note on your front door to have all deliveries made to the back patio.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Brunette

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: We use these table for our new outdoor dining area at our restaurant. They look great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sue Van Camp

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: This looks even better than the pictures. Perfect for outdoor dining.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dossett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finish is a little rough in places. Pieces fit-up well. Could use more leveling adjustment in the foot.
customer_reviews.author: user1096

customer_reviews.title: terrific table
customer_reviews.text: great table..just as advertised...well made...stable...plenty weight for wind....all in all peachy....good shipper too
customer_reviews.author: misterfingers

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor table!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son's backyard and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Table for 4
customer_reviews.text: This table is so easy to assemble. All tools are provided and organized. Directions are simple to follow. I had it completely unpacked and assembled in less than 20 minutes. Best of all it looks so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: The table is pretty but the 48” is only 46”.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome! Good quality, great size, easy to put together and arrived quickly! Highly recommend for small dining table. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Crany

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy table. Looks great, easy assembly. Excellent addition to our patio.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Very comparable to what you find on the retail stores, and considering that you don't pay Shipping it is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Perez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table! It is the perfect size for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table! It is the perfect size for the space and goes well with the 4 swivel chairs that we already had. We would have for liked the table to be a bit heavier, but so far it has not blown off our windy porch.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A. Bompiani

customer_reviews.title: The table is perfect; easy to put the legs on
customer_reviews.text: The table is perfect; easy to put the legs on. The reason for the 4 stars is due to some scratches of the paint on the table
customer_reviews.author: Diane Clark

customer_reviews.title: Patio Table review
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the money. Easy to put together. It was done in an hour. Don't have to worry about broken glass tops. That is why I bought the table. WE have had the table thru the hot summer months and it weathers well.
customer_reviews.author: Anne-marie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Table is not 48" as advertised. It is 46 inches.
customer_reviews.author: BethP

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on our deck. We haven't eaten a meal inside since we got it!
customer_reviews.author: art arpin

product_meta.title: Crosley Furniture Sedona Solid-Cast Aluminum Outdoor Dining Table, 42-inch, Black
product_meta.description: It may be hot outside, but you'll feel cool kicking back in our heavy duty, solid-cast aluminum furniture. Your very own outdoor oasis awaits you.
feature_bullets: Elegantly designed 42-inch round table with intricately woven details
Heavy duty cast aluminum construction, perfect for outdoor entertaining
Maintenance free and UV resistant charcoal black finish
Center hole for your patio umbrella
A perfect match for the Sedona Collection Arm Chairs or High Back Chairs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars103 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
